name: Interaction Studio ATM
description: Demonstrate how IS can communicate with external systems, in this case and ATM machine.

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Name of the Heroku application above (either Heroku default or your custom name).

KEY.ClientID: This is the Interaction Studio Client ID, not your marketing cloud API user!

ClientSeceret.description: This is the Interaction Studio Client Seceret, not your marketing cloud API user!

Logo.description: Your customers logo, It should be around 50px high. if it's bigger it will be scaled down.

Main bacground colow.description: You can use a color name or a hex code ie. White or #ffffff
